title.rendered: Virtual Fair Training for Employers – August 2020

content.rendered:
Change is in the air, and most recruiting will be done virtually this year. We’re here to help you get setup for success with virtual career fairs. Join us for a detailed walk-through of the strategies and tactics you need to make the shift to an all-virtual fall on Handshake. You’ll learn how to:

  • Register your organization for Virtual Career Fairs
  • Sign up your teammates to attend the Fair
  • Create schedules for limited group sessions and 1:1 sessions during the Virtual Fair 
  • Follow up with students you meet using proven best practices
